long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
DoubleClue PasswordSafe is part of the DoubleClue digital identity protection solution. The integrated password manager enables DoubleClue users to conveniently manage their passwords and easily log in to their web applications using Single Sign-On (SSO).

Instead of entering your credentials repeatedly, all you need is a single click on the application in the DoubleClue UserPortal - and you are automatically logged into the service.

DoubleClue PasswordSafe uses the secure KeePass encryption to encrypt your credentials and enhances it with multifactor authentication. The solution also supports the OTP industry standard and creates 2FA codes for your online accounts that can be automatically entered for you during the login process.
